ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_picn | |- _pi e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_halfcl | |- ( _pi e. CC -> ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC |
| 4 |  | #P_asincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arcsin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_subneg | |- ( ( ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC /\ ( arcsin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - -u ( arcsin ` A ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - -u ( arcsin ` A ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_asinneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arcsin ` -u A ) = -u ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` -u A ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - -u ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. CC -> _pi e. CC ) |
| 10 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _pi / 2 ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 9, 10, 4 | #P_subsubd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _pi - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( _pi - ( _pi / 2 ) ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_pidiv2halves | |- ( ( _pi / 2 ) + ( _pi / 2 ) ) = _pi |
| 13 | 1, 3, 3, 12 | #P_subaddrii | |- ( _pi - ( _pi / 2 ) ) = ( _pi / 2 ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( _pi - ( _pi / 2 ) ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) |
| 15 | 11, 14 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _pi - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) + ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 16 | 6, 8, 15 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` -u A ) ) = ( _pi - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_negcl | |- ( A e. CC -> -u A e. CC ) |
| 18 |  | #P_acosval | |- ( -u A e. CC -> ( arccos ` -u A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` -u A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` -u A ) ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_acosval | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` A ) = ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _pi - ( arccos ` A ) ) = ( _pi - ( ( _pi / 2 ) - ( arcsin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 16, 19, 21 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( arccos ` -u A ) = ( _pi - ( arccos ` A ) ) ) |
